spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall zoning roughly matches (open living left, kitchen central/top, two bedrooms right, wet areas bottom/center), but several key layout details deviate. Dining area is not clearly defined/separated as in plan (E2/E4). Balcony placement/relationship to lounge appears shifted (render shows a broad terrace-like platform not matching the small balcony off the lounge) (E2/E4). Bath/WC configuration and door positions do not match the plan’s distinct Bath and separate WC arrangement (E2/E3). Multiple curved/rounded internal partitions change wall alignment compared to the rectilinear 2D plan (E2/E4). Window openings appear larger/longer and not aligned to the plan’s indicated window spans (E2).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness looks generally consistent, but internal wall geometry is not faithful (curved/arc walls where plan shows straight walls) (E2/E4). Door embedding/orientation is inconsistent with the plan (several openings are shifted and/or represented with atypical curved returns) (E2/E3). Adjacencies are partially preserved (kitchen near living; bedrooms on right), but the service core (Bath/WC/L'dry/Linen) does not resolve to the same partitions as the plan (E2/E1). Linen closet at entry is not clearly present (E1). Balcony is represented as a larger terrace element, effectively altering the building envelope (E5/E4).

furniture_mapping.notes: Only minimal furniture/fixtures are shown. Kitchen counters/appliances are approximate but not mapped to the 2D plan’s exact run lengths/positions (E2/E4). Living/dining furnishings are largely missing or non-specific relative to the labeled dining/lounge areas (E1). Fixture scaling appears plausible, but the lack of mapped items prevents accurate verification.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera is clear and readable. Lighting is clean and consistent. Geometry is mostly clean, but the use of curved interior partitions and oversized glazing reads as a design reinterpretation rather than a faithful reconstruction (counts against orthographic/projection fidelity). Visual composition is strong, with good material differentiation.

detected_errors.description: Entry LINEN closet from the 2D plan is not clearly modeled/present in the 3D render.
Balcony location/relationship to the lounge differs; the 3D shows a larger terrace-like slab not matching the small balcony off the lounge.
Balcony/terrace size is exaggerated relative to the plan, altering exterior proportions/envelope.
Dining area is not distinctly represented as in the 2D plan (open living zone appears over-dominant/undifferentiated).
Interior wall alignment deviates: multiple curved/rounded partitions appear where the 2D plan shows straight rectilinear walls.
Bath/WC partitioning deviates from the plan’s separate Bath and separate WC arrangement.
Door placement/orientation for the wet-area core (Bath/WC) and central hall appears inconsistent with the 2D plan’s hinged door locations/swings.
Window placement/extent is not faithful: the 3D render uses long/large glazed openings that do not match the plan-indicated window spans.
Hallucinated architectural detailing: rounded/curved entry/hall forms and oversized glazing read as invented elements not supported by the 2D plan.
